name: chaincode
description: Chaincode con contratos ping y calculadora

scripts.start:external: npm run build && (export CHAINCODE_SERVER_ADDRESS=0.0.0.0:9998 CHAINCODE_ID=basicts_1.0:f320ff3387d192d46e0d68ceba59a2ebd256401949d0fab09ef195183861a4e2 && fabric-chaincode-node server --chaincode-address=$CHAINCODE_SERVER_ADDRESS --chaincode-id=$CHAINCODE_ID)
